Subsection.Text: Any insurer issuing or delivering group health insurance policies in this state must provide to a policyholder, within 21 days after a written request, information required for bid, including, but not limited to, the following information for the previous 3 years or for the entire period of coverage, whichever is shorter:

Paragraph.Text: Number of insureds on a monthly basis.

Subsection.Text: This section does not require the insurer to disclose any information that is required by law to be confidential.
